meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Martinez Simone Chavoor Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6846.

td.p: Steve Martinez, a U.S. Air Force logistics readiness officer from Fairfax, Virginia
Simone Chavoor, a media consultant from Oakland, California
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 15-day cash winnings total $314,900)

tr.td: WHAT'S COOKING?
IMPRESSIVE SPORTS RECORDS
AUTHORS' RHYME TIME
BIG STUFF
"BOARD" WALK
EMPIRE

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
